mapper.sql: create_user, create_time, modify_user, modify_time, is_deleted, id, audit_type, job_fair_id, campus_id, user_id, apply_time, audit_res, audit_feedback, audit_user, audit_time, status
mapper.select: SELECT t1.* FROM ( SELECT ct.id year_id, ct.type_name year_name, cj.id job_fair_id, cj.job_fair_title, cj.quarter, ca.id audit_id, ca.user_id, ca.apply_time, ca.audit_res, ca.audit_time, ca.audit_feedback, ca.status audit_status, ct2.id campus_id, ct2.type_name campus_name FROM crim_type ct INNER JOIN crim_job_fair cj ON ct.id = cj.year_level_id AND cj.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN crim_audit_record ca ON cj.id = ca.job_fair_id AND ca.audit_type = 1 AND ca.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN crim_type ct2 ON ct2.id = ca.campus_id WHERE ct.pid = 5 AND ct.is_deleted = 0 ) t1 ${ew.customSqlSegment}
